engagement_grid._comment: G1: Who was engaged and how

engagement_descriptions.people_who_use_drugs_other: The Bourne Substance Free Coalition used abatement funds to run their prevention and smart decision promotion, Sticker Shock Campaign for the spring of 2024. This campaign was inclusive to people who use drugs, people in recovery, and impacted families.
engagement_descriptions.people_in_recovery_other: The Bourne Substance Free Coalition used abatement funds to run their prevention and smart decision promotion, Sticker Shock Campaign for the spring of 2024. This campaign was inclusive to people who use drugs, people in recovery, and impacted families.
engagement_descriptions.families_impacted_other: The Bourne Substance Free Coalition used abatement funds to run their prevention and smart decision promotion, Sticker Shock Campaign for the spring of 2024. This campaign was inclusive to people who use drugs, people in recovery, and impacted families.
engagement_descriptions.subject_matter_experts_other: The Town of Bourne launched a Request for Proposal to acquire a contract with someone who will develop an Opioid Needs Assessment for the Town, conduct the assessment, conduct focus groups, surveys, meetings, in depth interviews to then produce an action plan for the Town to follow in order to address the needs that were found.

disparities_assessment.barriers: We were in the process of hiring a contractor to do such work for our needs assessment.

behavioral_health_assessment._comment: G3: How behavioral health needs were assessed

planning.process: Our municipality conducted its own planning process.

treatment.barriers: Have not developed our plan yet.

recovery_support.barriers: Have not developed our plan yet.

connections_to_care.barriers: Have not developed our plan yet.

harm_reduction.barriers: Have not developed our plan yet.

criminal_justice.barriers: Have not developed our plan yet.

pregnant_parenting.barriers: Have not developed our plan yet.

how_spent: Other (please specify): Collaborated with a community-based coalition to provide education on prevention smart choices through their Sticker Shock Campaign.
Other (please specify):: Legal fees related to hiring a contracted company to conduct our needs assessment and develop the Town's implementation plan.
